## Hi, I'm Maureen Mugo <img src="https://media.giphy.com/media/hvRJCLFzcasrR4ia7z/giphy.gif" width="25px">

I'm  a dedicated programmer, passionate AI enthusiast, and an eager learner at [fast.ai](https://course.fast.ai/). My journey in the world of technology has been an exciting one, fueled by curiosity and a thirst for knowledge.

In this blog, I'm delighted to share the valuable insights and notes I've gathered from various learning platforms and exciting projects I've had the privilege to explore. My primary goal is to document my learning odyssey comprehensively and share the wealth of knowledge with fellow AI enthusiasts.

I am quite easy to reach out via [email](mailto:mugomaureenw@gmail.com) or
feel free to connect or contact me via [linkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/maureen-mugo-6a215a178/) or [twitter](https://twitter.com/Maureen__Mugo).
